Seit einem Jahr bin ich ein leidenschaft: I've been a passionate programmer for a year now who loves to develop complex website applications. Currently I work as a frontend development mentor at the Developer Academy. Now I want to go one step further and develop myself personally. I am open for new challenges and would be interested to learn the other side of web development (backend) in the future.

Ein traditioneller Klassiker aus den etw: A traditional classic from the slightly older years. Since I played this game before when I was about 10 years old, I wanted to program it myself once as a challenge. That was a lot of fun!
Sharkie ist ein kleines Javascript-Spiel: Sharkie is a small javascript game where the main focus is on OOP. The goal of the game is to collect as many coins as possible. The poison bottles are also important, otherwise it will be a bit harder to win!
Jetzt kommt das Projekt, auf das ich am: Now comes the project I am most proud of. This is my own Kanban board, where the main focus is on Angular as frontend framework and Firebase as backend. In this project the Cloud Firestore and Authentication of firebase was used.
